she/her, 34, USA, happily married.

[pfp: a drawing of me generated in picrew. I have long brown hair, glasses, and I'm making a peace sign.]
[cover photo: my tattoo, which is Majora's Mask from the game of the same name. It is surrounded by tribal tattoo designs that are meant to imitate a musical staff. The Song of Healing, a heavily featured motif from the game, is outlined on the staff.]
